steps.title: How to add content to your 'Header'
steps.content: Let's personalise your header content.

steps.title: Navigate to the 'Content' section
steps.content: In the top bar, locate and click on the 'Content' section.

steps.title: Go to 'Settings'
steps.content: On the left-hand side, you will see the content tree, click on the 'Settings' node.

steps.title: Add a new 'Item'
steps.content: Click the 'Add Item' button to open the Menu Item.

steps.title: Menu Item
steps.content: Choose to link to an external or internal page.

steps.title: Add the 'Item' to your header
steps.content: Press the 'Submit' button to place the 'Item' on the header
steps.element: #umbracoMainPageBody > umb-backoffice-icon-registry > div.umb-editors > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div.umb-editor-footer > div > div > umb-button:nth-child(2) > div > button

steps.title: Reorder your 'Header Navigation'
steps.content: Once an item is in place you can drag and drop each link to reorder.

steps.title: Add a new 'Button'
steps.content: Click the 'Add Call To Action' button to open the 'Content'.

steps.title: Fill in needed information
steps.content: Choose the size and select a link for this button.

steps.title: Add the button to your header
steps.content: Press the 'Create' button to place the button on the header.
steps.element: #umbracoMainPageBody > umb-backoffice-icon-registry > div.umb-editors > div > div.scoped-view > ng-form > div > ng-form > div > div.umb-editor-footer > div > div > umb-button:nth-child(2) > div > button

steps.title: Save the result
steps.content: Once you are happy with the changes, in the bottom right of the screen, hit 'Save and Publish'. Your updates are now live on your site! :-)

steps.title: How to add content to your 'Footer'
steps.content: Let's personalise your footer content.

steps.title: Navigate to the 'Content' section
steps.content: In the top bar, locate and click on the 'Content' section.

steps.title: Go to 'Settings'
steps.content: On the left-hand side, you will see the content tree, click on the 'Settings' node.

steps.title: Open the 'Footer' tab
steps.content: Click the Footer tab to open the footer settings.

steps.title: Add a 'Footer item'
steps.content: On the 'Footer' tab, locate the section called 'Footer Navigation'. Click on 'Add Item' at the bottom of the list.

steps.title: Footer Item
steps.content: Choose to link to an external or internal page.

steps.title: Add the 'Item' to your footer
steps.content: In the bottom-right corner, click 'Submit'
steps.element: #umbracoMainPageBody > umb-backoffice-icon-registry > div.umb-editors > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div.umb-editor-footer > div > div > umb-button:nth-child(2) > div > button

steps.title: Reorder your 'Footer Navigation'
steps.content: Once an item is in place you can drag and drop each link to reorder.

steps.title: Add a 'Media Button'
steps.content: On the 'Footer' tab, locate the section called 'Social Media Buttons'. Click on 'Add Social Button' at the bottom of the list.

steps.title: Fill in needed information
steps.content: Select a link and an icon for this button

steps.title: Add the button to your footer
steps.content: Press the 'Create' button to place the button on the footer.
steps.element: #umbracoMainPageBody > umb-backoffice-icon-registry > div.umb-editors > div > div.scoped-view > ng-form > div > ng-form > div > div.umb-editor-footer > div > div > umb-button:nth-child(2) > div > button

steps.title: Save the result
steps.content: Once you are happy with the changes, in the bottom right of the screen, hit 'Save and Publish'. Your updates are now live on your site! :-)

steps.title: How to create your design
steps.content: Let’s create your special design together

steps.title: Navigate to the 'Content' section
steps.content: In the top bar, locate and click on the 'Content' section.

steps.title: Go to 'Global Design'
steps.content: On the left-hand side, you will see the content tree, click on the 'Global Design' node.

steps.title: Available 'Design'
steps.content: On the right-hand side, you will see a grid of all 'Design' already created for your site. You can add as many of these as you wish.

steps.title: Go to 'Design'
steps.content: Choose your new design or any prebuilt design
steps.element: #contentcolumn > div > div > div > div > form > div > umb-variant-content-editors > div > div > umb-variant-content > div > div > div > div.umb-pane > div > div.umb-editor-sub-views > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > umb-property > div > ng-form > div > div.umb-el-wrap > div.controls > div > div > div > div > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1)

steps.title: Open the 'Header&Footer' tab
steps.content: Click the 'Header&Footer' tab to choose the Header and Footer design.

steps.title: Choose the Header and Footer design
steps.content: On the 'Header&Footer' tab, locate the sections called 'Header Options' and 'Footer Options' and you can see different design options for the header and footer. Select design options for the header and footer.

steps.title: Save and Publish
steps.content: Once you are happy with the changes, in the bottom right of the screen, hit 'Save and Publish'. Your updates are now live on your site! :-)
